<report>

  <join>
    <affinity>Global</affinity>
    <entity_from_name>SUBSCRIBER_2</entity_from_name>
    <entity_to_name>INVOICE_2</entity_to_name>
    <entity_from_id>SUBSCRIBER_2</entity_from_id>
    <entity_to_id>INVOICE_2</entity_to_id>
    <join_type>leftouter</join_type>
    <relation_type>1M</relation_type>
    <weight>0</weight>
    <key>
      <col_from_name>SUBSCRIBER_ID</col_from_name>
      <col_to_name>SUBSCRIBER_ID</col_to_name>
    </key>
    <clause>
      <left_side>SUBSCRIBER_ID</left_side>
      <left_side_type>Column</left_side_type>
      <comparison>EQ</comparison>
      <right_side>SUBSCRIBER_ID</right_side>
      <right_side_type>Column</right_side_type>
      <conjunction>AND</conjunction>
      <level>0</level>
    </clause>
  </join>
  <join>
    <affinity>Global</affinity>
    <entity_from_name>CONTRACT_2</entity_from_name>
    <entity_to_name>SUBSCRIBER_2</entity_to_name>
    <entity_from_id>CONTRACT_2</entity_from_id>
    <entity_to_id>SUBSCRIBER_2</entity_to_id>
    <join_type>inner</join_type>
    <relation_type>11</relation_type>
    <weight>0</weight>
    <key>
      <col_from_name>CONTRACT_ID</col_from_name>
      <col_to_name>SUBSCRIBER_ID</col_to_name>
    </key>
    <clause>
      <left_side>CONTRACT_ID</left_side>
      <left_side_type>Column</left_side_type>
      <comparison>EQ</comparison>
      <right_side>SUBSCRIBER_ID</right_side>
      <right_side_type>Column</right_side_type>
      <conjunction>AND</conjunction>
      <level>0</level>
    </clause>
  </join>
  <join>
    <affinity>Global</affinity>
    <entity_from_name>CUSTOMER_2</entity_from_name>
    <entity_to_name>CONTRACT_2</entity_to_name>
    <entity_from_id>CUSTOMER_2</entity_from_id>

    <relation_type>1M</relation_type>

      <col_from_name>CUSTOMER_ID</col_from_name>

    </key>
    <clause>
      <left_side>CUSTOMER_ID</left_side>
      <left_side_type>Column</left_side_type>
      <comparison>EQ</comparison>
      <right_side>CUSTOMER_ID</right_side>
      <right_side_type>Column</right_side_type>
      <conjunction>AND</conjunction>
      <level>0</level>
    </clause>
  </join>
  <filter>
    <filter_name>CUSTOMER_2.CUSTOMER_ID</filter_name>
    <order_num>0</order_num>
    <operator>=</operator>
    <prompt_flag>False</prompt_flag>

    <filter_ref_id>1981387930</filter_ref_id>

  <dynamicfilters />
